nf-core-hackathon.instructions: Once you get a bingo: 1️⃣ Add yourself to the leaderboard with: `name (Github handle)`.  2️⃣ Shout 'BINGO!' on the hackathon slack channel with a screenshot of your board 3️⃣ Post your win on Twitter and tag `@nf_core` 4️⃣ Press 'new board' to start again 😎
